H0.text: In April 1814 which King gained the French throne to begin the Bourbon Restoration. Louis XVI

H1.text: In April 1814 which King gained the French throne to begin the Bourbon Restoration. Louis XVII

H2.text: In April 1814 which King gained the French throne to begin the Bourbon Restoration. Charles X

H3.text: In April 1814 which King gained the French throne to begin the Bourbon Restoration. LOUIS XVIII

A6.text: The Bourbon Restoration was ruled successively by two younger brothers of Louis XVI

A7.text: The Bourbon Restoration came to an end with the July Revolution of 1830, which deposed Charles X
